sentences.en: It is as though I am standing in place called hallowed ground.
sentences.cn: 在你面前,我仿佛站在了最为神圣的地方.

sentences.en: It's as though I am standing in the place called Hallowed Ground.
sentences.cn: 我仿佛站在一片叫做圣土的地方.

sentences.en: Morgan had committed a kind of sacrilege in dissolving all these hallowed dogmas into thin air.
sentences.cn: 这样,把所有这些神圣教条打得粉碎的摩尔根,就是犯了某种渎圣罪.

sentences.en: one of the theatre's most hallowed traditions
sentences.cn: 戏院最受尊崇的传统之一

sentences.en: Our Father art in heaven. Hallowed be thy name.
sentences.cn: 我们在天上的父. 愿人都尊伱的名为圣.

sentences.en: Our Father which are in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
sentences.cn: 我们在天上的父, 愿人都尊你的名为圣.

sentences.en: Our father who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
sentences.cn: 我们天上的父, 愿人都尊你的名为圣.

sentences.en: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name.
sentences.cn: 哦,天父, 天上的真神, 愿尊祢名为圣.

sentences.en: She is a lady who hallowed in the town.
sentences.cn: 在该市她是一名受人尊敬的女士.

sentences.en: The bones will be buried in hallowed ground.
sentences.cn: 尸骸将被安葬在神圣的土地上。

sentences.en: The document enshrined the hallowed principle of " equal security ".
sentences.cn: 这份文件把 “ 同等安全 ” 视若神圣原则.

sentences.en: The hallowed portals of academe were slowly and grudgingly opening to women.
sentences.cn: 大学神圣的大门缓慢又勉强地向女性敞开。

sentences.en: The hallowed turf of Twickenham is the venue for the Middlesex Rugby Sevens Finals.
sentences.cn: 备受尊崇的特威肯纳姆体育场是米德尔塞克斯七人制橄榄球赛决赛的比赛场地。

sentences.en: Those are kind of hallowed places for me.
sentences.cn: 他们对于我来说都是极其神圣的地方.

sentences.en: Until men united wield a hallowed sabre.
sentences.cn: 人们联合起来挥动那把神圣的军刀.

sentences.en: Who are none other than Hari Himself and chant His hallowed name!
sentences.cn: 这不是别的,正是哈瑞自己,唱颂他的圣名吧!

words.tran_cn: 神圣的,被尊为神圣的,受崇拜的

trans.tran_en: holy or made holy by religious practices
